patterns: What are the different Specialization in M.Tech

responses:

Mechanical Engineering-Industrial Engg. & Management,

Electronics & Communication Engineering-Advanced Communication and Information System & Advanced Electronics and Communication, 
Computer Science & Engineering-Computer Science and Engineering.
